name: EXPO67(CPPA) Lowpoly Forest
description:
PRE NFT record logs...

[20-12-‎16]
This piece is inspired by the "Association canadienne des pâtes et papiers (CPPA)" pavilion at the Montreal World Expo 1967, conceived by the architect Peter M. Acres and designer William Kissiloff. The loop was created to go along with other expo 67 related visuals playing on tour with the band "Les Requins" performing sixties cover. It was made in after effects with Trapcode TAO.
